Commentary.ab: Y10.3a barəšnuš] Kellens; Geldner barṣ̌nuš; Pirart barəšnušu. Irr. loc. pl. for barəšnušu or irr. acc. pl. for barəšnūš.Cf. Y10.17 barəšnušuua gairinąm.

Y10.3b urūruδuša] Bartholomae, Kellens, Pirart *urūruδiša (2nd. sg. perf. opt.); Josephson, 1997 *urūruδuš, (n.sg. part.perf.); Kümmel, 2000 p. 666 urūruδuša (instr.sg. part.perf. perhaps as unadapted quotation from a lost passage).

Parallels.ab: baršnuš paiti gairinąm = Y9.26, VS2.23; ~ Y10.17 barəšnušuua gairinąm; ~ V5.1 haca barəšnauuō gairinąm; ~ VS5.1, VS5.2 auui barəšnauuō gairinąm; ~ Yt14.21 barəšnauuō ... gairinąm; ~ Yt18.6 barəšnauuō gairinąm.
garaiiō bərəzaṇto = Yt10.14; ~ Yt13.9 garaiiasca yōi bərəzaṇtō.
